title: Scientist 1 - Wet Chemistry, Lenexa, KS
full_description: Pace's Lenexa, KS environmental laboratory is seeking a new team member on the Wet Chemistry analysis team.  The successful candidate will be responsible for providing or overseeing the analysis, administration and oversight of standard chemistry/biochemistry policies, programs and practices; feedback and guidance regarding the analysis of samples using fundamental professional and technical knowledge of chemistry/biochemistry or related instrumentation, testing, and procedures. The position requires a Bachelor's degree in chemistry/biochemistry, or a closely related field; OR an equivalent combination of education, training and experience.  Requires the mobility to work in a lab and office setting, use standard office and lab equipment and stamina to sit for extended periods of time; exerting up to 20 pounds of force occasionally and/or up to 10 pounds of force frequently to lift, carry, push, pull or move objects; vision to read printed materials and computer screens; and hearing and speech to communicate in person or over the telephone.  Work is performed in a lab and office setting while using required personal protective equipment (lab coat, safety glasses and gloves).
